p.k: Comedy, Art Usa (2009). Hrají: Nick Offerman, Keith Poulson, Kevin Corrigan. Režie: Bob Byington.
p.d: Byington creates an offbeat energy by brilliantly pairing established actors and non-actors in this comedic fable about a man watching his life fly by. Max (Keith Poulson), along with his best friend Sal (Nick Offerman, "Parks & Recreation") and the woman they both adore, Lyla (Jess Weixler, TEETH), stumble through thirty-five years of seemingly mandatory but unfulfilling entanglements.
